title: The Prisoner
description:
You're living the life you promised yourself you'd build. But now the dream feels more like a trap. To escape, you need to risk everything you’ve worked for, and one again bet on yourself.

Hosted by Karole Foreman.

This episode contains depictions of domestic violence and may not be suitable for all listeners. If you or someone you know is experiencing domestic violence, contact the National Domestic Violence Hotline at 1-800-799-SAFE (7233).

Listen to new episodes 1 week early and to all episodes ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App https://wondery.app.link/imaginedlife.

Support us by supporting our sponsors!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
